definition: court/imperial household/dynasty
abbr. for 朝鮮|朝鲜[Chao2 xian3] Korea
imperial or royal court/government/dynasty/reign of a sovereign or emperor/court or assembly held by a sovereign or emperor/to make a pilgrimage to/facing/towards
morning
palace courtyard

sentences.english: Ming court belied that its greatest challenges and opportunities were at home.
sentences.chinese: 明朝朝廷认识到最大的挑战和机遇是在国内。

sentences.english: Jiao Fang took charge of entertainment music, while Da Sheng Fu served as an official administrative structure.
sentences.chinese: 大晟府成立于北宋末年，是朝廷正式的音乐管理机构。

sentences.english: Hanlin Academy was the administration for the books collection in Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 明代对此有所因革，朝廷典藏改由翰林典籍管理。

sentences.english: You can see that the "Emperor" of the authority and court ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 在这里可以看到“清朝皇帝”的威严和朝廷仪式。

sentences.english: The time since the Song Dynasty people have used it as a tribute of the imperial court.
sentences.chinese: 自宋朝的时分就有人用它作为贡品进贡朝廷。

sentences.english: Yuan Yuan twenty-eight years in July, the court approved the construction of an independent county town of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 元朝至元二十八年七月，朝廷同意上海镇建独立县。

sentences.english: The kings and royal governments often promoted the composing of Ci directly by ordering people to do it.
sentences.chinese: 帝王或朝廷往往以命人应制的方式直接推动词的创作。

sentences.english: Xiao Zhen did grow up to win a very high post in the imperial government, and he lived to be more than ninety years old.
sentences.chinese: 萧振长大后，果然在朝廷身居高职，活到了九十多岁。

sentences.english: Then, the Song court was forced to move to Hangzhou as its imperial court because it could not push back the nomadic invaders.
sentences.chinese: 那时南宋朝廷不敌游牧民族的进攻，被迫转移到杭州。

sentences.english: In old China, this was where the academics from Yunnan province took their entrance exams for the imperial court.
sentences.chinese: 在旧中国，这里是云南参加朝廷的科举考试的学院。

sentences.english: When leaving the court you have to bow yourself out as you go.
sentences.chinese: 当离开朝廷时，你得躬身退出。

sentences.english: In Xia Dynasty, the rulers bestowed rewards in court in order to make eminent the good.
sentences.chinese: 夏代在朝廷上奖励有功的人，是为了鼓励好人。

sentences.english: Given the turnover of dynasties in the past, I don't think the Qing could be revived.
sentences.chinese: 过往朝廷覆辙在前，我想大清不还阳的那天了。

sentences.english: Though the county magistrate is a post of seventh rank, after all, it is an official appointed by imperial court.
sentences.chinese: 县官的官阶虽然只有七品，但大小也是朝廷命官。

sentences.english: It could be seen as a top management department of the country's financial managment system.
sentences.chinese: 可看成是朝廷封桩财政管理系统的一级管理机构。

sentences.english: They  bowed before the emperor as he entered the court.
sentences.chinese: 皇帝进入朝廷时他们都向他鞠躬致敬。
